name: Bird Get
description:
A game made for the "MidnightForce x SAE" Game Jam.

Wanting to be a part of the Midnight Force, you receive your first task - hack into one of the pigeon drones and deliver it back to your base for research. But something went wrong and other drones didn't seem to like it much. Get out of there alive, dodge 5G towers and pigeon drones in order to fulfill your mission.

Controls: W - up; S - down.

Art & Visuals: Dainis K .

Programming: Daniel R. Salas S.

Game design / Title screens / Audio: Pete K.

Music:

.zip and .rar versions available :)
